pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Varied Types of Books and Documents with R 'bookdown' Package // A collection and selector of R 'bookdown' templates. 'bookdownplus' helps you write academic journal articles, guitar books, chemical equations, mails, calendars, and diaries. R 'bookdownplus' extends the features of 'bookdown', and simplifies the procedure. Users only have to choose a template, clarify the book title and author name, and then focus on writing the text. No need to struggle in 'YAML' and 'LaTeX'.
